trends: There have been 20 other sightings in Lodi
There were no other sightings in Lodi on or around March 4th 2006
divs: Sighting Detailsthe circular dusty lights styed over my car as I drove for about 5 m. until I came to a stop light intercection. Then the lights still dancing in a circle perfectly without hitting each other, got further way from us going up and vanished. I did not know what to think, except I'm sure they were not spot lights. I could not take my eyes of of it,seemed like these unknown dusty round lights were entertaining me. It was really interesting. I thought it might have been related to UFO activity.
Summary: Driving on highway 12 Lodi California, when I noticed 5 or 6 glowing dusty circular lights right above my windshield, these lights where dancing in a perfect circle and stayed on top of my car as if following me as I drove along.
